Description: Egypt, view of Colossi of Memnon. Pair of giant stone sculptures representing seated adult males. Small group of adult males riding horses along unpaved road at left. Medium: Gelatin silver print.
Producer name: Photographed by: John Frederick Clifford Hunt
Curator's comments: Circumstances: The Imperial War Museum holds photographs from the same collection with a more military content - see [HUN-] PIC DOC 66.
